summary: The Constitutionally-mandated U.S. Census provides vital information, including data for congressional redistricting. But we've found that the 2020 Census involves some risks . The Census Bureau has identified hundreds of risks to the 2020 Census. For example, the Bureau's information systems face potential cyberattacks. The Bureau has mitigation and contingency plans for most of those risks. We reviewed the Bureau's plans for 6 key risks...
title: 2020 Census: Additional Actions Needed to Manage Risk
